donor_name: GLOBAL FUND TO FIGHT AIDS, TUBERCULOSIS
outputs.output_descr: The key components of the project will include the establishment of TB/HIV joint Technical Coordinating Units in the Ministry of Health-GoSS, organise national level TB/HIV planning meetings to review and evaluate progress, establish an Advocacy, Communication and Social Mobilisation (ACSM) Unit, monitoring and evaluation of collaborative TB/HIV activities, increased TB case findings among PLWHA, provision of treatment for latent TB infection for HIV positive patients, and the provision of infection control services in health care settings and or congregate settings.

project_descr: Tuberculosis and HIV Collaborative Program in S.Sudan
project_title: Tuberculosis and HIV Collaborative Program in S.Sudan
